More growth is on the horizon! Flair is expanding its base in Kitchener-Waterloo with increased frequencies, an additional aircraft and two NEW routes:
#YKF ✈️ #YSJ, effective June 8, 2022 (3x weekly)

data.text:
2022 is off to a flying start with a career-high and a historical WIN for 🇨🇦! Congratulations to Flair ambassador @felixtennis and #TeamCanada!
2022 démarre en trombe avec un sommet en carrière et une VICTOIRE historique pour 🇨🇦! Félicitations à @felixtennis et #EquipeCanada! https://t.co/fyxY1mb2Fx
RT @TennisCanada: Hours later, this is how we're all still feeling right now: 😄 https://t.co/SyFvnjGI6S

Researchers say the cabin design and airflow system are the equivalent of more than 7ft (2m) of physical distance b/w every passenger—even on a full flight. This, paired with proper health & safety protocols lower the risk of passengers contracting #COVID19 during air travel. https://t.co/bW7VQF02zN

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Curious about how air is circulated and filtered on our planes?⬇️
• High air exchange rate
• Airflow from ceiling to floor in circular pattern
• HEPA filters trap 99.9%+ of particulates
• Seat configurations act as barriers
For more, peep @Boeing's 📖 https://t.co/cZYwFazqYH https://t.co/aftdfbFMeq

data.text: The Year of the Tiger is upon us, and what better place to celebrate the Lunar New Year than in Victoria, Canada's oldest Chinatown. There will be no shortage of rich cultural experiences to help ring in the New Year. Find affordable flights to #yyj here https://t.co/O2skEC56Gm https://t.co/nzlo5uF49C

entity.name: 🎂8日はGENERATIONS from EXILE TRIBE・佐野玲於さんの誕生日

data.text: Eat, drink, and fasten your seatbelts because we're back with the snacks! We're excited to keep you connected (and well fed) in the clouds with our in-flight app. Pick your snack, order in the app, and get it delivered right to your seat! Visit https://t.co/OzEtmRiibn for more. https://t.co/ROhqPhqdQm

Meet Sully, 8-week-old Yorkshire Terrier puppy named after the heroic 'Miracle on the Hudson' pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger III 🐶
Flair recently welcomed this little guy onboard for their first flight. Sully, we can't wait to welcome you back onboard soon! https://t.co/4GjqZGWw7a

data.text: @SimarSi72872189 Use the form on this page: https://t.co/zGEwvnPuwx.
@SimarSi72872189 Send an email with details to baggage@flyflair.com. You can also text or phone 855-936-5656.
@BrittanyLobo Send us a text at 855-936-5656 or email support@flyflair.com. We have a high volume of communications so it may take time for the team to respond.
@MarMarDub Hi Marissa! Please send us a DM with your booking number and our customer service team will assist.
@winstonckm Send us a DM please

Happy New Year from everyone at Flair Airlines! ✨

De toute l'équipe Flair, nous vous souhaitons une bonne et heureuse nouvelle année. ✨ https://t.co/F5cBiNYQ01

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
entity.description: A ten-year-old boy befriends and shelters a gentle alien creature who has been stranded on Earth. When the authorities are alerted to this unusual house guest, the boy tries to help the creature return home before menacing government agents close in. The film won three Academy Awards for music, sound and special effects.

entity.name: A look back as the world welcomed 2022 ✨
entity.description:
2021 was another year spent in a global pandemic but there were some bright spots of celebrations.

➡️  See how the world ushered in the new year and finally said goodbye to 2021, from Sydney to Honolulu.
